readable.content: A man in a black cap and shirt smiling while holding a white grey and black rectangular object . A man smiles and poses with a product he appears to be trying to sell . A man wearing a black shirt and baseball cap smiling . The man is wearing a black shirt and hat and smiling . There is a man with a black shirt and a black hat smiling .
